Articles.Content:
EDIT: No, I wont make up some excuse to justify me not completing this, so I'll say it: I got bored with how long and uninteresting this was

Edited October 18, 2015 by Xannari Ferrows
Wait, I don't understand this. Why aren't these in my account anymore...? WHAT IS LIFE!?
How about some background on the rover? And more pics of it in the light .

MAJOR UPDATE: Updates will resume, but I'm am not sure as to the nature of how I should proceed, so I will await an answer to my question, as well as post 1 more update [later] to show the changes.

EDIT: Sweet! I'm still in! Although that wont make it any faster, not to mention I'll be away for the Delta IV launch for a while.

EDIT: Updates will resume tomorrow, or in 2 cycles.

Edited July 25, 2015 by Xannari Ferrows
